sourcesContent:
import React, {Fragment} from 'react'
import Slider from 'react-slick'
import Question from './components/Question'
import Select from './components/Select'
import Button from './components/Button'
import {Column} from './components/layout'
import styled from "styled-components";

const strany = [
    'TIP',
    'STRANA MODERNÉHO SLOVENSKA (SMS)',
    'OBYČAJNÍ ĽUDIA a nezávislé osobnosti (OĽANO - NOVA)',
    'Demokrati Slovenska - Ľudo Kaník',
    'ŠANCA',
    'SME RODINA - Boris Kollár',
    'Strana zelených Slovenska',
    'KOALÍCIA SPOLOČNE ZA SLOVENSKO',
    'MKDA-MKDSZ',
    'VZDOR',
    'MOST - HÍD',
    'SNS',
    'Odvaha - Veľká národná a proruská koalícia',
    'KSS',
    'SDKÚ-DS',
    'SMER-SD',
    'KDH',
    'SKOK!',
    'ĽS Naše Slovensko',
    '#SIEŤ',
    'SMK-MKP',
    'PD',
    'SaS',
]

let settings = {
    speed: 500,
    slidesToShow: 1,
    slidesToScroll: 1,
    draggable: false,
    arrows: false,
    accessibility: false,
    infinite: false,
};

const Bar = styled.h1`
  color: ${props => props.theme.colors.darkBlue};
  font-size: 20px;
  font-weight: bold;
`

class Form extends React.Component {
    slider
    state = {
        inputValue: ''
    }
    render() {
        return(
            <Fragment>
                <form action="https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf2YbzVtPCINoBOqCpZ2zBLDfViR5xU1OY9qsG_jH7qVMPgtg/formResponse">
                    <input hidden name="entry.1038519199" value={this.state.inputValue} />
                    <Column fill>
                        <Slider ref={node => { this.slider = node }} {...settings}>
                            <Question
                                index={1}
                                title="Akú stranu ste volili v parlamentných voľbách 2016?"
                                middlePart={<Select items={strany} />}
                                bottomPart={<Button onClick={() => this.slider.slickNext()} />}
                            />
                            <Question
                                index={2}
                                title="Zúčastnite sa volieb do európskeho parlamentu?"
                                bottomPart={<Button onClick={() => this.slider.slickNext()} />}
                            />
                            <Question
                                index={3}
                                title="Aku stranu budete voliť?"
                                bottomPart={<Button onClick={() => this.slider.slickNext()} />}
                            />
                            <Question
                                index={4}
                                title="Akych kandidatov bude kruzkovat?"
                                bottomPart={<Button onClick={() => this.slider.slickNext()} />}
                            />
                            <Question
                                index={5}
                                title="V akom okrese bývate?"
                                bottomPart={<Button onClick={() => this.slider.slickNext()} />}
                            />
                            <Question
                                index={6}
                                title="Pohlavie"
                                bottomPart={<Button onClick={() => this.slider.slickNext()} />}
                            />
                            <Question
                                index={7}
                                title="Aké máte vzdelanie?"
                                bottomPart={<Button onClick={() => this.slider.slickNext()} last />}
                            />
                        </Slider>
                    </Column>
                </form>
                <Flex>
                    <Flex />
                </Flex>
            </Fragment>
        )
    }
}

export default Form
